meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Margaret Murphy Michael Rose Dan Jensen Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6061.

td.p: Margaret Murphy, an assistant housing manager from Davenport, Iowa
Michael Rose, a labor relations journalist from Washington, D.C.
Dan Jensen, a restaurant manager from Reston, Virginia (whose 2-day cash winnings total $40,202)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Begun in 1503, it\'s been called "the most famous portrait in art history"')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Begun in 1503, it's been called "the most famous portrait in art history"

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', 'Whether I reported on Carlos Santana (the catcher, not the guitarist) or a pre-Heat-ed Lebron, I loved it at this city\'s WEWS')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Whether I reported on Carlos Santana (the catcher, not the guitarist) or a pre-Heat-ed Lebron, I loved it at this city's WEWS

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_3_1', 'clue_J_3_1_stuck', 'This word once referred to a mushroom puree more often than to the familiar tomato version')

tr.td: This word once referred to a mushroom puree more often than to the familiar tomato version

toggle('clue_J_4_1', 'clue_J_4_1_stuck', '(Dan: What is Tide?)

DanMargaret
')

div.h3: Scores at the first commercial break (after clue 15):

tr.td: (Alex: You have to name the river that runs between the countries we give you.)

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '
MargaretWhat is the caduceus?
$1,200
MichaelWhat is the cadeuseus?
$6,599
DanWhat is the caduceus??
$1,201
the caduceus')

tr.td: One tale of its origin says that the blind seer Tiresias separated 2 snakes with his staff

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
